name: Dungeoneer (itch) (Pekkka)
description: Dungeoneer is a roguelite 2D platformer project that I've been working on for a little over a week now. You basically go around a room killing enemies, trying not to die and farming gold. You can go to a shop to buy certain upgrades and when you think your'e strong enough to face a boss type enemy, you just go up to a statue and activate it.
